verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Purify my heart,
Let me be as gold
And precious silver.
Purify my heart,
Let me be as gold,
Pure gold.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Purify my heart,
cleanse me from within
and make me holy;
Purify my heart,
cleanse me from my sin,
deep within.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Refiner's fire,
My heart's one desire
Is to be holy,
Set apart for You, Lord.
I choose to be holy,
Set apart for You, my Master,
Ready to do Your will.
